__e: And Rex... I don't know if you've noticed, but he's kind of a scary guy.
Rex... She wasn't sure, and-and I promised her it would be fine.
It's true Rex and I did not have the perfect marriage, but for 18 years I tried my very best, and for that I am entitled to your respect.
But to get there, you have to come out from where you are... so that they'll let you come home to Rex. And to me.
How wonderful you were to him after Rex died.
